title: Spore - RELOADED Crack & Keygen Only (Windows and Mac)
description:
For those of you who wanted it.

Steps from Reloaded.nfo
1. Unrar. (Skip)
2. Burn or mount the image. (Skip)
3. Install the game, when asked for a serial enter one of the following:

SPF7-C9A2-AXYE-4ITI-2RLD
1KPX-FFAW-CAME-KLSA-2RLD
HDYG-T4TL-ANIC-7RTS-2RLD

4. Don't install the download manager, don't start without copying over crack first, don't register the game with an EA account, and don't go online.

5. Copy the cracked content over from the Crack directory on the disc to
your installation directorySporeBin.

6. Play the game.

******FOR THE MAC******
Apparently the crack works on one of the newer mac operating systems as well.
OutrageousBlighter:
windows crack works fine on 10.5.4. Just put the .exe in Spore.app/Contents/Resources/transgaming/c_drive/Spore/SporeBin

Thanks for the info dude.

This game is awesome!
